commit message:
Fix change orientation on userNamePrompt

If you changed the orientation while the username prompt was opened, the game proceeded to the 'game over' screen without saving the record. I fixed this by adding an additional activitystate named 'GAMELOST_TOPSCORE'.

Added the half bars feature

Added the half bars feature by dividing 'active' into 'sectionOneActive' and 'sectionTwoActive'

Merge pull request #2 from wesen1/half-bars

Added the half bars feature

Merge pull request #22 from wesen1/master

Fixed change orientation on userNamePrompt and added half bars
Allow the direction of a half bar to be controlled
